messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: Looking for shogun miniseries on vhs or .avi.....
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Folks I am getting a lot of email asking about the tapes. I did post to let people know what i could do for them. so I will summerise here so I dont
messages.messageBody:
Hi Folks

I am getting a lot of email asking about the tapes.

I did post to let people know what i could do for
them. so I will summerise here so I dont disappoint
people any more.

1. I like in the UK.
2. The system we use in Europe for videos means they
will not work in the uSA
3. I am more than happy to copy as many sets as people
require (when I have done the ones I am doing now for
you guys)
4. I only want 5 Pounds to cover the tapes and
shipping

If you fit in this area please contact me and I will
do anything I can help.

Chad if I can hep you out please meail and I will do a
set for you as soon as possible

Paul


--- chad adair <dream_maker_666@...> wrote:

---------------------------------
